detail_desc: Jumper in soft, fine-knit lambswool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short-sleeved dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with a sailor collar, decorative bow at the front and concealed press-stud at the neckline. Gathered seam at the top and a sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.
V-neck top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester. Buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Stylish ballet pumps with a V-shaped opening and pointed toes. Imitation leather linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel 1 cm.
Sports top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wide turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Round sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a glittery motif, zip at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size approx. 11x16 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short-sleeved top. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Thin metal chain necklace with two round pendants, one with an embossed pattern. Length 63 cm.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, lace at the front, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with an imitation leather appliqué on one sleeve and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a V-neck and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Elastication at the back of the waist, press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a sheen. Wrapover with a press-stud at the front and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Fitted T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Knee-length kaftan dress in softly draping jersey with a slight sheen. Deep V-neck front and back, a gathered seam below the bust and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Unlined.
Coat in felted fabric with notch lapels, welt side pockets, a tie belt at the waist and a single back vent. No buttons. Unlined.

Short, boxy jacket in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, high collar and zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Dance leotard in glossy jersey with crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Glittery elasticated waistband and a layered tulle skirt. Lined gusset.
Leggings in washed, superstretch, patterned, flexible denim for maximum movement. Elasticated waist and fake front pockets.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim in a slightly looser fit. Extra-high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with elastication and a flounce. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Softshell trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, zip fly with a press-stud, diagonal side pockets and snow flaps at the hems. Brushed thermal inside. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Pull-on trousers in soft, washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets with decorative, gathered frills, back pockets and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.

Longer-style top in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves, inset lace sections at the top of the front, and a rounded hem.
Short dungaree dress in stretch cotton corduroy with a chest pocket, buttons at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Unlined.

Sleeveless dress in tulle with floral appliqués at the top, buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared, tiered tulle skirt. Satin lining. Matching hairband in a double layer of jersey with floral appliqués on the front and covered elastication at the back.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, and long sleeves. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the waist and hem. Unlined.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a regular waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake flap pockets at the back.

Maxi dress in lace and jersey with cap sleeves and a boat-necked bodice in lace. Concealed zip in one side with a hook-and-eye fastener at the top, an inset hem-stitched band at the waist and a skirt in heavily draping jersey with a sheen. Unlined apart from the lower section of the bodice which has a jersey lining.
Earrings in various sizes.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Brushed inside.
Loafers in imitation leather with a decorative seam at the front and metal buckle at the top. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel approx. 1.8 cm.
Bustier in sequin-embroidered mesh with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a visible zip at the back. Jersey lining.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted dress in ribbed jersey made from organic cotton.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood, stand-up collar with an elastic drawstring and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Fleece-lined handwarmer pockets and fleece-lined, flap front pockets with a press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Recycled polyester lining. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and tapered legs.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, extended waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Discreet pockets in the side seams, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases. The pocket linings are made from recycled polyester.
Oversized shirt in a cotton weave with a wide collar, classic front and chest pocket. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Shorter-style blouse in woven fabric with a small, gathered stand-up collar, an opening at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam with wide, gathered ties at the hem that fasten at the back. Unlined.
Dressing gown in terry with a hood and zip down the front with a chin guard.
Long dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back and short butterfly sleeves. Elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist. Lined.
Hat in soft cotton with small, knitted ears at the top.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit pima cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cotton canvas trainers with hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles.
Knee-length, printed swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide elastication, and short, wide legs.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of trousers with straps in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a ribbed collar, and press-studs at the top and crotch. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist and straps that cross at the back with adjustable buttoning.
Thin metal hoop earrings. Diameter 6 cm.
Slip-on fabric trainers with elastic gores at the front, a padded top edge and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Blouse in a soft weave with a wide, elasticated neckline, short, tie-hem raglan sleeves and an elasticated hem.

Jumpsuit in a patterned weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck, covered buttons at the top and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and straight, wide legs. Unlined.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a round neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour stripes down the sides, an elasticated drawstring waist and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, one back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved top in airy, ribbed jersey with a stand-up collar and straight-cut hem.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Backpack in a sturdy weave with imitation leather details and a roll-top opening with a zip and adjustable tab with a metal buckle. Handles at the top that can be fastened together, adjustable padded shoulder straps, a laptop compartment, a zipped inner compartment and side pockets. Lined. Size 17x43x53 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and high cut at the back.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crêpe weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in woven fabric with buttons down the front, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, deep armholes and a raw-edge hem.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt, zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Halterneck bralette in lace with triangular cups with removable inserts, a wide hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the front.

Long dress in a cool cotton and silk weave with a round, neckline with gathers for added width. Concealed buttons at the top, short, wide raglan sleeves and a gathered seam at the hem for extra width.
Bucket hat in woven fabric with eyelets at the sides and a cotton lining.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cap in velour with an adjustable fastener at the back. Mesh lining.
Joggers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Brushed inside.
